reviews.review: Игра мне очень понравилась! на прайме достаточно мало читеров
anti-cheat ruim e comunidade tóxica, recomendo a todos
11 лаки шотов в прыжке через дверь на миду в твою голову из 10
Yeni gelen güncelleme ile mükemmel olmuş
no need to at salt this already has enough :D
it is a very good game if you are ok with playing with loads of wallhackers and aimboters.
Ayuda no puedo dejar de jugaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaar :(
muito bom so acho q as caixas de drop pos partidas tinha q ser gratis, mais o jogo eh perfeito

Hello, this game sucks fat tramp dick, the ranking system in comp is barely there, i can play and win 5 games in a row with double digit frags but get out of silver? yeah no i assume im going to stay the rank i get after the 10 beginning for the rest of my life, not to mention again, the people you play with, some are wholesome and are nice while others are degenerates, on top of that majority of the people in the low ranks DO NOT BELONG THERE and make comp so much more agitating so, to sum it up. unless you just want to play casual are test your luck on comp and hope you have a balanced nice game in which case, this game is not free to play but instead you have to sell your soul to it
It can be a bit competitive at times, but it could be fun when you frag out.
hileler azaltılırsa zevkle oynayabileceğiniz bir oyun
The game was so nice i love it it has nice graphics and still not very much hackers
This is the best game ever easy!! Can't stop playing it! :)

The game is complete bullshit. A lot of cheaters, smurfs and boosters. Distribution of players on teams is not equal. When updates to the shooting and weapon damage no one writes a correction to the numbers and does not explain it in any way.

а так в целом игра на 10 из 10 если не запускать её
Joguinho gostosin pra passar raiva! haha
i love this game and it is my favorite game of all time.
So good game i love it!
The most "clean" FPS competitive game there is. Simple mechanics that you pick up on fairly quickly, but a lot to learn to master the game. Definitely better than CoD!
You get more enjoyment putting your nuts in a weedwacker
wkurwaia mnie mma przez to deproesje
jogo muito bom, porém existe muitos racistas nas partidas.

É um jogo legal. Porém há muitas pessoas tóxicas, racistas, etc. 
Sem contar que há um número muito alto de smurfs e xiters,  por isso não ligue pra patente, pois você não terá muito controle sobre ela. Vai subir e cair de patente inúmeras vezes, isso é normal. 
Se você for muito competitivo, isso pode acabar te estressando e desanimando, mas não desinstale o jogo, pois isso não vai resolver, você vai voltar e se estressar denovo. Também é normal.
 Enfim, se você conseguir jogar só pra se divertir, ÓTIMO. Agora se você busca evoluir, vai se estressar bastante.
 Boa Sorte !
лысейший кайф но пидоров очень много

Matchmaking total zerhackt und macht deshalb ab einer gewissen Elo kaum noch Spaß.

Doch trotzdem hat CS immer einen Platz in meinem Herzen.
Juegazo pero le faltan arreglar algunas cosas del MM
Игра стоит того, но читеры делают комьюнити такое, что каждый день ты хочешь играть всё меньше, и меньше.
